name: Aman
greetingText: Or should I say tiajot or cutejot or BQ or auntu or something new ? :P
wishText: You're an absolutely amazing person and I am lucky to be your good friend. Wishing you the absolute best cutejot. Always keep smiling and have fun today!
text1: It's your birthday!!! :D, sorry that me late
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you 28 year old aunty!! Yay! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do just like last year :P
text4: I realised(again), I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are pretty Special to me
outroText: Okay, now run to nangal sweets and eat 2 aloo tikkis, mere hisse ki bhi!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
